item.title: Report X-2023080574
item.description:
Report X-2023080574

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-29T21:11:32+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-01
  • City: GRIMES
  • State: IA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package was left in QA wrapped in a flimsy plastic bag, leaking product with a strong fume. We immediately placed it in a hazmat bag and a black tote and removed it from the work area. DescribePack: One of the caps of the two containers and worked itself off the spout. Through movement of transport much of the contents escaped from the bottle. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: We immediately placed it in a hazmat bag and a black tote and removed it from the work area. A DPR and ISF was completed and all contents, plus box and other items affected were placed in a Hazmat salvage drum.

item.description:
Report E-2023080655

  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.

  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During off loading the warehouse crew accidentally put a forklift fork into one of the 55 pound box of HPH powder (un3262) releasing 10 pounds of product. Contractors were dispatched for the containment and cleanup of the release.

item.title: Report E-2023080404
item.description:
Report E-2023080404

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-29T21:11:32+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-13
  • City: DES MOINES
  • State: IA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During off loading it was discovered that the load had shifted during transit and that one of the poly 330 gallon tote of prochlor (un1760) had been damaged by a sharp object and had released 5 ounces of product. Contractors were dispatched for the containment and cleanup of the release.
